rows.label: tlk004001_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Why...
All I did was think of my country.

rows.label: tlk004001_02_msg0003
rows.name:
But if so, then
how am I to protect the Superbian Empire?
The Divine Beast's life is drawing to a close...

rows.label: tlk004001_02_msg0004
rows.name: ...No, it's pointless to think about it now.

rows.label: tlk004001_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Please, stop the Divine Beast Weapon...!
If you don't, Superbia will be...
